config.visiblearmorslots.title: Visible Armor Slots Config
config.visiblearmorslots.restart.hint: Some settings may require reopening containers
config.visiblearmorslots.positioning.too: Which side of the screen to show the armor slots on
config.visiblearmorslots.margin_x.toolti: Distance from the edge of the container (0-128 pixels)
config.visiblearmorslots.margin_y.toolti: Vertical offset from default position (-64 to 64 pixels)
config.visiblearmorslots.enabled.tooltip: Enable or disable the visible armor slots overlay
config.visiblearmorslots.show_tooltips.t: Show item tooltips when hovering over armor slots
config.visiblearmorslots.auto_positionin: Automatically reposition when potion effects are visible
config.visiblearmorslots.containers.help: Click to toggle which containers show the armor slots overlay
